item.title: ChatWoot
item.description:
To set up WhatsApp ChatWoot integration you’ll need few things:

  1. WAHA - installed self-hosted WhatsApp API - âš¡ Quick Start
  2. ðŸ§© n8n Integration - to create workflows
  3. ChatWoot - either self-hosted or cloud version
    1. To use ChatWoot Cloud you need to make sure your n8n webhook is accessible from the internet
  4. PostgreSQL - to store ChatWoot data (and WAHA-ChatWoot relations)

ðŸ‘‰ Check out WAHA + ChatWoot Templates to start from the scratch and create your first ChatWoot integration!

item.title: Typebot
item.description:
To set up WhatsApp Typebot integration you’ll need few things:

  1. WAHA - installed self-hosted WhatsApp API - âš¡ Quick Start
  2. ðŸ§© n8n Integration - to create workflows
  3. Typebot - either self-hosted or cloud version
    1. To use Typebot Cloud you need to make sure your n8n webhook is accessible from the internet
  4. PostgreSQL - to store Typebot data (and WAHA-Typebot relations)

ðŸ‘‰ Check out WAHA + Typebot Template to start from the scratch and create your first Typebot integration!

item.title: Python
item.description:
We’ve created a few examples on how to interact with WAHA WhatsApp API with Python.

You can find the examples in examples folder on GitHub with detailed instructions in README.md ->
